question.questionA: Corolla with a crown-like projection or corona.
Corona deeply and regularly dentate; stamens exserted.
question.questionB: Corona entire or shallowly and irregularly dentate; stamens not exserted.

question.questionA: Flowers solitary, appearing in the autumn before the leaves; free perianth segments lanceolate; corona 2-3 mm.
question.questionB: Flowers in clusters ofthree to eighteen, appearing in the spring after the leaves; free perianth segments ovate; corona 4-7 mm.
